name: Prepear Pro Sync
author: The Prepear Team

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/prepear directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Prepear Name screen to login with your Pro account.
  4. After you successfully login you will be able to verify your site in the prepear app.
sections.faq:
What is a Prepear Pro account?

The Prepear platform allows content owners to plublish their content for users to use within the prepear platform. Learn more at https://www.prepear.com/food-bloggers/.

sections.description: This plugin will help you connect your Prepear Pro https://www.prepear.com/ account to your wordpress site.
